altRnative 0.1.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Geospatial Benchmark

Run benchmark for R code across R implementation and platform

Source: R/benchmark.R
benchmarks_code.Rd

Run benchmark for R code across R implementation and platform.

benchmarks_code(code, platforms = c("debian", "ubuntu"),
  r_implementations = c("gnu-r", "mro"), volumes = NULL, times = 3,
  pull_image = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

code

An expression or string of R code
platforms

List of platform
r_implementations

List of R implementation
volumes

Volume mapping from host to container. Passed to run_code.
times

How many times the code will be run. Passed to microbenchmark
pull_image

If set to TRUE, the needed docker image will be pulled first.
...

Parameters for microbenchmark

Examples

benchmarks_code(code = "1 + 1", times = 3)
#> [1] "1 + 1"
#> [1] "gnu-r" "mro"  
#> [1] "debian" "ubuntu"
#> [1] "Docker image for gnu-r and ubuntu is not supported"
#> [1] "Docker image for mro and debian is not supported"
#> Detected API version '1.40' is above max version '1.39'; downgrading
#> [1] "Full command"
#> [1] "Rscript" "-e"      "1 + 1"  
#> O> [1] 2
#> Detected API version '1.40' is above max version '1.39'; downgrading
